dt-option.name: fixedColumns.end
dt-option.summary: Number of columns to fix to the end of the table

type.description: The number of columns on the end of the table to fix in place.

dt-option.default: No columns will be fixed to the end of the table.
dt-option.description:
Very similar to the `-init fixedColumns.start` option, but in this case the option defines the number of columns that will be fixed at the end of the table.
This option is text direction aware - it will fix columns on the left for tables which are displayed with right-to-left text layout.
Columns that are not visible will be ignored.

example.title: No fixed columns at the start of the table, one at the end
